text:
@realDonaldTrump @LouDobbs This is what you tweet as we reach the 100,000 Coronavirus death count? Tens of thousands of those deaths could’ve been avoided had you cared more about the epidemic than the effect it might’ve had on the economy, and your re-election chances. 
“12 will dwindle down to zero” NOT!
